text:
Muje 18/03/2025 ko delivery liya hain river indi scooter ka 3 mistake or batata hoon...

1) handel jo hain achan nahin hain 2 to 5 km chalane ke baad sholder and hand main pain star ho jaega.
2) ground clearance sai nahin hain normal bump main main stand touch hota hain and lover body se khatarnak sound aata hain.
3) 2 person ke bethne ke baad suspension bahot down ho jata hain...  Main stand again sound karega esa lagega ki stand khulkar gir gaya hoga.....üò¢üò¢üò¢

author: @muneershaik5004

text:
¬†@muneershaik5004¬† they claimed 22k worth offer. They thought they will bluff and make me buy indie. I was actually about to buy but last 4 days initially they were dragging for permission for long test drive, exchange price they were not saying. They used to make me call every day for enquiry and they were not bothered. Finally on 31st December when I asked them to give it in writing so that I can book but they started avoiding my calls too.
I was in touch with bangalore team too but after 31st even company is not bothered. Their ego also got hit since I complained to bangalore office on Chennai showroom staff for showing no interest.
I will pay 40k extra and go with ather itself
